text: 12:6 1 Korin 12:28; 13:2; 1 Pita 4:10-1112:6-8 1 Korin 12:4-11Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God uan apangkuvimɨn gɨn ghua ingangaribar amuasa fofoziba isa mati bizir aghuibar mɨn vaghvagha e ganɨngi. Eghtɨ gumazitam o amizitam, Godɨn akam inigha izir fofozim ikɨva, a uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn mɨrara deravɨra Godɨn akamɨn gun me mɨkɨmam.
